comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cliff_Edwards and, possibly www.artistdirect.com/artist/frank-raye/2910927 www.fandango.com/bettybrewer/filmography/p120572 I'm suspicious the movie actress is a different, younger Betty Brewer. The Betty Brewer with the Tommy Dorsey orchestra in www.gettyimages.com/detail/73909100/Michael-Ochs-Archives seems a better bet. From www.historyforsale.com/html/prodetails.asp?documentid=280742 [a URL that is likely to disappear, since it is a "for sale" page for a signed page from an album.] "BETTY BREWER was a vocalist with the bands of Tommy Dorsey and Gordon Jenkins." www.timegoesby.net/weblog/2005/04/manhattan_tower.html mentions her and has a comment by her daughter.
